overview: A town confused by religion persecutes a woman who stole the braid from the statue of the Virgin.

production_companies.name: Sindicato de Trabajadores de la Producción Cinematográfica (STPC)

tagline: The Braid is used for everything ¿Victims of witchcraft, love affairs, loss of masculine vigor, constipation, obsession and other things that make women ugly.
title: The Braid
